verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <WH7969> In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> of the reign יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <WH3079> of Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah בָּ֣א <WH935> came נְבוּכַדְנֶאצַּ֧ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֛ל <WH894> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem וַיָּ֥צַר <WH6696> and besieged עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> gave אֲדֹנָ֨י <WH136> And the Lord בְּיָד֜וֹ <WH3027> into his hand אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹיָקִ֣ים <WH3079> Jehoiakim מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמִקְצָת֙ <WH7117> with part כְּלֵ֣י <WH3627> of the vessels בֵית־ <WH1004> of the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God וַיְבִיאֵ֥ם <WH935> which he carried אֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> into the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <WH8152> of Shinar בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> to the house אֱלֹהָ֑יו <WH430> of his god וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַכֵּלִ֣ים <WH3627> the vessels הֵבִ֔יא <WH935> and he brought בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> house אוֹצַ֥ר <WH214> into the treasure אֱלֹהָֽיו׃ <WH430> of his god

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> spake הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לְאַשְׁפְּנַ֖ז <WH828> unto Ashpenaz רַ֣ב <WH7227> the master סָרִיסָ֑יו <WH5631> of his eunuchs לְהָבִ֞יא <WH935> that he should bring מִבְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> [certain] of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמִזֶּ֥רַע <WH2233> seed הַמְּלוּכָ֖ה <WH4410> and of the king's וּמִן־ <WH4480> some הַֽפַּרְתְּמִֽים׃ <WH6579> and of the princes

יְלָדִ֣ים <WH3206> Children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom אֵֽין־ <WH369> else בָּהֶ֣ם כָּל־ <WH3605> every [מְאוּם כ] (מוּם֩ <WH3971> blemish ק) וְטוֹבֵ֨י <WH2896> but well מַרְאֶ֜ה <WH4758> favoured וּמַשְׂכִּילִ֣ים <WH7919> and skilful בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every חָכְמָ֗ה <WH2451> in all wisdom וְיֹ֤דְעֵי <WH3045> and cunning דַ֙עַת֙ <WH1847> in knowledge וּמְבִינֵ֣י <WH995> and understanding מַדָּ֔ע <WH4093> science וַאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> and who כֹּ֣חַ <WH3581> and such as [had] ability בָּהֶ֔ם לַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> in them to stand בְּהֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> palace הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> in the king's וּֽלֲלַמְּדָ֥ם <WH3925> and whom they might teach סֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> the learning וּלְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> and the tongue כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <WH3778> of the Chaldeans

וַיְמַן֩ <WH4487> appointed לָהֶ֨ם הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king דְּבַר־ <WH1697> provision י֣וֹם <WH3117> A daily בְּיוֹמ֗וֹ <WH3117> A daily מִפַּת־ בַּ֤ג <WH6598> meat הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> of the king's וּמִיֵּ֣ין <WH3196> and of the wine מִשְׁתָּ֔יו <WH4960> which he drank וּֽלְגַדְּלָ֖ם <WH1431> so nourishing שָׁנִ֣ים <WH8141> years שָׁל֑וֹשׁ <WH7969> them three וּמִ֨קְצָתָ֔ם <WH7117> that at the end יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> thereof they might stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> become בָהֶ֖ם מִבְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> Now among these were of the children יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1840> Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <WH2608> Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <WH4332> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> and Azariah

וַיָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> gave לָהֶ֛ם <WH1992> Then שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> Unto whom the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֖ים <WH5631> of the eunuchs שֵׁמ֑וֹת <WH8034> names וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> for he gave לְדָֽנִיֵּ֜אל <WH1840> unto Daniel בֵּ֣לְטְשַׁאצַּ֗ר <WH1095> [the name] of Belteshazzar וְלַֽחֲנַנְיָה֙ <WH2608> and to Hananiah שַׁדְרַ֔ךְ <WH7714> of Shadrach וּלְמִֽישָׁאֵ֣ל <WH4332> and to Mishael מֵישַׁ֔ךְ <WH4335> of Meshach וְלַעֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> and to Azariah עֲבֵ֥ד נְגֽוֹ׃ <WH5664> of Abednego

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <WH7760> purposed דָּנִיֵּאל֙ <WH1840> But Daniel עַל־ <WH5921> in לִבּ֔וֹ <WH3820> in his heart אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִתְגָּאַ֛ל <WH1351> that he would not defile בְּפַתְבַּ֥ג <WH6598> meat הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וּבְיֵ֣ין <WH3196> nor with the wine מִשְׁתָּ֑יו <WH4960> which he drank וַיְבַקֵּשׁ֙ <WH1245> therefore he requested מִשַּׂ֣ר <WH8269> of the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֔ים <WH5631> of the eunuchs אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִתְגָּאָֽל׃ <WH1351> that he might not defile

וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> had brought הָֽאֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> Now God אֶת־ <WH853> דָּ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> Daniel לְחֶ֖סֶד <WH2617> into favour וּֽלְרַחֲמִ֑ים <WH7356> and tender love לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> with שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> the prince הַסָּרִיסִֽים׃ <WH5631> of the eunuchs

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> said שַׂ֤ר <WH8269> And the prince הַסָּרִיסִים֙ <WH5631> of the eunuchs לְדָ֣נִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> unto Daniel יָרֵ֤א <WH3373> I fear אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who מִנָּ֔ה <WH4487> who hath appointed אֶת־ <WH853> מַאֲכַלְכֶ֖ם <WH3978> your meat וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁתֵּיכֶ֑ם <WH4960> and your drink אֲשֶׁ֡ר <WH834> who לָמָּה֩ <WH4100> why יִרְאֶ֨ה <WH7200> for why should he see אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵיכֶ֜ם <WH6440> your faces זֹֽעֲפִ֗ים <WH2196> worse liking מִן־ <WH4480> more הַיְלָדִים֙ <WH3206> than the children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who כְּגִֽילְכֶ֔ם <WH1524> exceedingly וְחִיַּבְתֶּ֥ם <WH2325> endanger אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשִׁ֖י <WH7218> my head לַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> to the king

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> Then said דָּנִיֵּ֖אל <WH1840> Daniel אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּלְצַ֑ר <WH4453> to Melzar אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom מִנָּה֙ <WH4487> had set שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> whom the prince הַסָּֽרִיסִ֔ים <WH5631> of the eunuchs עַל־ <WH5921> over דָּנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1840> over Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <WH2608> Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <WH4332> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> and Azariah

נַס־ <WH5254> Prove נָ֥א <WH4994> Please אֶת־ <WH853> עֲבָדֶ֖יךָ <WH5650> thy servants יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days עֲשָׂרָ֑ה <WH6235> I beseech thee ten וְיִתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> and let them give לָ֜נוּ מִן־ <WH4480> some הַזֵּרֹעִ֛ים <WH2235> us pulse וְנֹאכְלָ֖ה <WH398> to eat וּמַ֥יִם <WH4325> and water וְנִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> to drink

וְיֵרָא֤וּ <WH7200> be looked upon לְפָנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> before מַרְאֵ֔ינוּ <WH4758> Then let our countenances וּמַרְאֵה֙ <WH4758> thee and the countenance הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> of the children הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <WH398> that eat אֵ֖ת <WH853> פַּתְבַּ֣ג <WH6598> meat הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's וְכַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who תִּרְאֵ֔ה <WH7200> and as thou seest עֲשֵׂ֖ה <WH6213> deal עִם־ <WH5973> with עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> with thy servants
וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> So he consented לָהֶ֖ם לַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> to them in this matter הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיְנַסֵּ֖ם <WH5254> and proved יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days עֲשָׂרָֽה׃ <WH6235> them ten

וּמִקְצָת֙ <WH7117> And at the end יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days עֲשָׂרָ֔ה <WH6235> of ten נִרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> appeared מַרְאֵיהֶם֙ <WH4758> their countenances ט֔וֹב <WH2896> fairer וּבְרִיאֵ֖י <WH1277> and fatter בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> in flesh מִן־ <WH4480> than כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> than all the children הָאֹ֣כְלִ֔ים <WH398> which did eat אֵ֖ת <WH853> פַּתְבַּ֥ג <WH6598> meat הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of the king's

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> continued הַמֶּלְצַ֗ר <WH4453> Thus Melzar נֹשֵׂא֙ <WH5375> took away אֶת־ <WH853> פַּתְבָּגָ֔ם <WH6598> the portion of their meat וְיֵ֖ין <WH3196> and the wine מִשְׁתֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH4960> that they should drink וְנֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> and gave לָהֶ֖ם זֵרְעֹנִֽים׃ <WH2235> them pulse

וְהַיְלָדִ֤ים <WH3206> children הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these אַרְבַּעְתָּ֔ם <WH702> As for these four נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> gave לָהֶ֧ם הָֽאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God מַדָּ֥ע <WH4093> them knowledge וְהַשְׂכֵּ֖ל <WH7919> and skill בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> in all learning וְחָכְמָ֑ה <WH2451> and wisdom וְדָנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1840> and Daniel הֵבִ֔ין <WH995> had understanding בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all חָז֖וֹן <WH2377> in all visions וַחֲלֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH2472> and dreams

וּלְמִקְצָת֙ <WH7117> Now at the end הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> of the days אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָמַ֥ר <WH559> had said הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king לַהֲבִיאָ֑ם <WH935> he should bring וַיְבִיאֵם֙ <WH935> brought שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> them in then the prince הַסָּרִיסִ֔ים <WH5631> of the eunuchs לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> them in before נְבֻכַדְנֶצַּֽר׃ <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> communed אִתָּם֮ <WH854> for הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> And the king וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> not נִמְצָא֙ <WH4672> with them and among them all was found מִכֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all כְּדָנִיֵּ֣אל <WH1840> none like Daniel חֲנַנְיָ֔ה <WH2608> Hananiah מִֽישָׁאֵ֖ל <WH4332> Mishael וַעֲזַרְיָ֑ה <WH5838> and Azariah וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> therefore stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> they before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וְכֹ֗ל <WH3605> every דְּבַר֙ <WH1697> And in all matters חָכְמַ֣ת <WH2451> of wisdom בִּינָ֔ה <WH998> [and] understanding אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which בִּקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> enquired מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king וַֽיִּמְצָאֵ֞ם <WH4672> of them he found עֶ֣שֶׂר <WH6235> them ten times יָד֗וֹת <WH3027> better עַ֤ל <WH5921> better כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַֽחַרְטֻמִּים֙ <WH2748> than all the magicians הָֽאַשָּׁפִ֔ים <WH825> [and] astrologers אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all מַלְכוּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4438> that [were] in all his realm

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> continued דָּֽנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> And Daniel עַד־ <WH5704> until שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year אַחַ֖ת <WH259> continued [even] unto the first לְכ֥וֹרֶשׁ <WH3566> Cyrus הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> of king פ
